creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
Should probably now delete the Http User Parameters Modifier class.

It cannot be auto-updated, but I doubt it has been used for a (very) long time.

If deleted, the files bin/users.xml and users.dtd could probably also be removed.

Consider whether to replace with ObsoleteGUI?
Yes too, this element is certainly very obsolete (I've never use it)
creator: milamber@apache.org

text:
URL: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=1235574&view=rev

text: This one is fixed, I close it
